game_description: Get an up-close look at all your favorite LIGHT BALANCE characters dancing in 360 3D Virtual Reality! Rising to global acclaim as the only 2-time Golden Buzzer award-winning dance troupe on "America's Got Talent," LIGHT BALANCE delivers ultramodern immersive neon LED light performances that intertwine with signature acrobatic dance choreography. Supporting playback at up to 6K resolution, purchase the app to get 6 songs in 3 separate experiences. Whether in VR or IRL, you've definitely never seen anything like it! Check out @lighbalance online: https://lightbalance.net/ Produced by @virtualityxr Music by @justifiednoise Edited by @channo.yoon VFX by @art.and.al
review_1: First, thank you developers and performers of the fun videos, I like it. More please if possible. Make this a dance along app to enjoy. More dance and dancing music please. Thanks
review_2: There isn't enough content to watch but then it's cheap and right price for this. Are there plans to add more in the future because I want more.
review_3: I got the app and only saw 3 performances, but it says 6 songs. Please advise.
